message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio. This ensures a fair share while also considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'll take the higher share now to mitigate the effects of inflation. Your turn to decide.
Given the situation, I propose an equal division of the funds. This ensures both of us receive a fair share without risking more valuable money in the future.
I'll take a slightly higher share now to account for the accelerating inflation, but I'm willing to compromise.
